EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-12-28-Turbostack Last Chance.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Win a TurboStack Homelab! Drawing January 1st
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://turbonomic.com/turbostack-giveaway?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbostack&utm_content=12282016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Don't miss your chance to enter to win this month's TurboStack home lab, the drawing will be January 1st. The TurboStack Home Lab is an expertly crafted hardware and software bundle that has been engineered to allow you to easily bring OpenStack to your virtual environment. The TurboStack was created to enable you to experiment with OpenStack safely in your own homelab. Leveraging the OpenStack Juno build – the TurboStack also includes a full NFR License to Turbonomic 5.3. Click below, watch the short video on the page, and enter to win your own Turbostack Home Lab. <[[http://turbonomic.com/turbostack-giveaway?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbostack&utm_content=12282016]]> Enter for a chance to win! Turbonomic Homelab Valued over USD $1300. What's in the Turbonomic Home Lab?
- (1) Intel NUC NUC6i5SYK
- (2) HyperX 8GB DDR4 RAM
- (1) Synology DS916+ 4-Bay NAS
- (2) Western Digital 1TB 3.5″ 7200 RPM SATA Drives
- (1) Samsung 850 EVO 250GB SATA III TLC Internal Solid State Drive
- (1) Cisco SG300 10-Port Gigabit Managed Switch
- (3) Ethernet Cables
-The Turbonomic Team
